name: Multisite Store Viewer
author: CedCommerce

sections.description:
Multisite store viewer extension facilitates multisite administrator to list all their sites on a single page. From where user as well as administator can switch to their site.
There is also a search field to search their respective site by its name.

Main features

  • List all subsites of user on a single page.
  • Filter site by its Site Name.
  • Add logo for each site.
  • Use with Multisite wordpress.
  • User friendly and easy to use.
  • Compatible with WooCommerce

Support

If you need support or have any question then kindly use our online chat window here or send us email at support@cedcommerce.com

sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Multisite Store Viewer , log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Multisite Store Viewer” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our Multisite Store Viewer plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our Multisite Store Viewer plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
What is Multisite Store Viewer ?

Multisite Store Viewer plugin list all sites on a single page with search option.
There are the following main features :

  • List all subsites of user on a single page.
  • Upload logo to each site.
  • Filter site by its Site Name.
  • Use with Multisite wordpress.
  • User friendly and easy to use.
  • WPML Compatible
  • Translation Ready
  • Compatible with WooCommerce
  • Upload the logo for each site from single page
  • Option to Enable/Disable search setting
  • Enable/Disable to open the site on new tab
  • Exclude Current Site from Listing
